Package view_controller.utils

Class Input

java.lang.Object
view_controller.utils.Input
public class Input extends Object
Input is responsible for handling all input from the player. When the user presses down a key, the Input class is able to call any methods listening for key events.

  • Method Details

    • setScene

      public static void setScene(javafx.scene.Scene scene)
      Assign the static Input a scene to collect button information from. When the user presses a key, the events will be detected by the scene. So the Input class will need to get that data from scene.
      Parameters:
      scene - to get information about key events from.

      Parameters:
      type - keybinding type to read key from
      Returns:
      the key the keybinding is associated with
